Text:
This contains the following pits.. For Falcon 4.0

F-16C 40/42
F-16C 50/52
F-16A MLU

Also includes 1 Stock Pilot..
and 2 Custom Pilots...

Good Stuff

The cockpits linked above do not have functional current .dat files for use with Allied Force, or with RV1. 

For more information, visit www.stopworks.us
